item.title: Changing the color of notification badges in OSX
item.description: @@@ writes that after changed the notification label from blue to red, Facebook saw a dramatic uptick in useage. It is hypothesized because red is the color of urgency, the color red does a good job at hijacking our prehistorical brains. I’m not on Facebook. I am on OSX however, and I feel like I check my messages too much. I experimented turning off my message notifications full stop, but that didn’t work for me.
